flawed_nl_solution:
The cost will for 3 adults will be $12/adult x 3 adults = $<<12*3=63>>63
The cost for 3 children will be $10/child x 3 children = $<<10*3=30>>30
The total cost will be $63 + $30 = $<<63+30=93>>93

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 63. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
